GSD.description:
powerpc/iommu: Add missing of_node_put in iommu_init_early_dart

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit df6d8b689252c0acc0448d4ae3d33f2d6db048ab. For more details please see the references link.
